title: Instructional Designer Operational Priority Analysis and PBL Application Project

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary math concepts and PBL (Project-Based Learning) experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with a focus on mathematical problem-solving projects

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply core elements of the Analysis phase in the ADDIE instructional design model.
Learners can establish design strategies considering learner characteristics (age, learning background, etc.) in math PBL projects.
Learners can create a portfolio evaluating instructional design priorities tailored to educational contexts (institutional type, delivery mode).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
